Fits Multivariate Generalised Linear Mixed Models (and related models)
using Markov chain Monte Carlo techniques (Hadfield 2010 J. Stat.
Soft.).

# Package index

## All functions

- [`ABPvirus`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/ABPvirus.md)
  : Data on Acute Bee Paralysis Virus Infections in Bumblebees from
  Pascall et al. (2018).

- [`BTdata`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/BTdata.md)
  : Blue Tit Data for a Quantitative Genetic Experiment

- [`BTped`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/BTped.md)
  : Blue Tit Pedigree

- [`Ddivergence()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/Ddivergence.md)
  : d-divergence

- [`Dexpressions`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/Dexpressions.md)
  : List of unevaluated expressions for (mixed) partial derivatives of
  fitness with respect to linear predictors.

- [`Dtensor()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/Dtensor.md)
  : Tensor of (mixed) partial derivatives

- [`FullGrumpy`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/FullGrumpy.md)
  : Full Grumpy Scores of Academics

- [`Grumpy`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/Grumpy.md)
  : Grumpy Scores of Academics

- [`KPPM()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/KPPM.md)
  : Kronecker Product Permutation Matrix

- [`MCMCglmm()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/MCMCglmm.md)
  : Multivariate Generalised Linear Mixed Models

- [`MCMCglmm-package`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/MCMCglmmPackage.md)
  : Multivariate Generalised Linear Mixed Models

- [`PlodiaPO`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/PlodiaPO.md)
  : Phenoloxidase measures on caterpillars of the Indian meal moth.

- [`PlodiaR`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/PlodiaR.md)
  : Resistance of Indian meal moth caterpillars to the granulosis virus
  PiGV.

- [`PlodiaRB`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/PlodiaRB.md)
  : Resistance (as a binary trait) of Indian meal moth caterpillars to
  the granulosis virus PiGV.

- [`Ptensor()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/Ptensor.md)
  : Tensor of Sample (Mixed) Central Moments

- [`SShorns`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/SShorns.md)
  : Horn type and genders of Soay Sheep

- [`Tri2M()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/Tri2M.md)
  : Lower/Upper Triangle Elements of a Matrix

- [`at.level()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/at.level.md)
  : Incidence Matrix of Levels within a Factor

- [`at.set()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/at.set.md)
  : Incidence Matrix of Combined Levels within a Factor

- [`buildV()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/buildV.md)
  : Forms expected (co)variances for GLMMs fitted with MCMCglmm

- [`commutation()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/commutation.md)
  : Commutation Matrix

- [`dcmvnorm()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/dcmvnorm.md)
  : Density of a (conditional) multivariate normal variate

- [`dprior()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/dprior.md)
  : Prior Density of Variance or Standard Deviation

- [`evalDtensor()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/evalDtensor.md)
  : Evaluates a list of (mixed) partial derivatives

- [`gelman.prior()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/gelman.prior.md)
  : Prior Covariance Matrix for Fixed Effects.

- [`inverseA()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/inverseA.md)
  : Inverse Relatedness Matrix and Phylogenetic Covariance Matrix

- [`knorm()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/knorm.md)
  : (Mixed) Central Moments of a Multivariate Normal Distribution

- [`krzanowski.test()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/krzanowski.test.md)
  : Krzanowski's Comparison of Subspaces

- [`kunif()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/kunif.md)
  : Central Moments of a Uniform Distribution

- [`list2bdiag()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/list2bdiag.md)
  : Forms the direct sum from a list of matrices

- [`me()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/me.md) :
  Design Matrix for Measurement Error Model

- [`mult.memb()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/mult.memb.md)
  : Design Matrices for Multiple Membership Models

- [`path()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/path.md)
  : Design Matrix for Path Analyses

- [`pkk()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/pkk.md)
  : Probability that all multinomial categories have a non-zero count.

- [`plot(`*`<MCMCglmm>`*`)`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/plot.MCMCglmm.md)
  : Plots MCMC chains from MCMCglmm using plot.mcmc

- [`plotsubspace()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/plotsubspace.md)
  : Plots covariance matrices

- [`posterior.ante()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/posterior.ante.md)
  : Posterior distribution of ante-dependence parameters

- [`posterior.cor()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/posterior.cor.md)
  : Transforms posterior distribution of covariances into correlations

- [`posterior.evals()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/posterior.evals.md)
  : Posterior distribution of eigenvalues

- [`posterior.inverse()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/posterior.inverse.md)
  : Posterior distribution of matrix inverse

- [`posterior.mode()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/posterior.mode.md)
  : Estimates the marginal parameter modes using kernel density
  estimation

- [`predict(`*`<MCMCglmm>`*`)`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/predict.MCMCglmm.md)
  : Predict method for GLMMs fitted with MCMCglmm

- [`IW()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/prior_generators.md)
  [`IG()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/prior_generators.md)
  [`F()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/prior_generators.md)
  [`tSD()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/prior_generators.md)
  : Generator Functions for Priors in MCMCglmm

- [`prunePed()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/prunePed.md)
  : Pedigree pruning

- [`rIW()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/rIW.md)
  : Random Generation from the Conditional Inverse Wishart Distribution

- [`rbv()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/rbv.md)
  : Random Generation of MVN Breeding Values and Phylogenetic Effects

- [`residuals(`*`<MCMCglmm>`*`)`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/residuals.MCMCglmm.md)
  : Residuals form a GLMM fitted with MCMCglmm

- [`resolve_prior()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/resolve_prior.md)
  : Resolves a Prior Specification in MCMCglmm

- [`rprior()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/rprior.md)
  : Simulate Covariance Matrices from Prior

- [`rtcmvnorm()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/rtcmvnorm.md)
  : Random Generation from a Truncated Conditional Normal Distribution

- [`rtnorm()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/rtnorm.md)
  : Random Generation from a Truncated Normal Distribution

- [`sigma`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/sigma.md)
  :

  Infection Data for Sigma Virus in *Drosophila melanogaster*

- [`simulate(`*`<MCMCglmm>`*`)`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/simulate.MCMCglmm.md)
  : Simulate method for GLMMs fitted with MCMCglmm

- [`sir()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/sir.md)
  : Design Matrix for Simultaneous and Recursive Relationships between
  Responses

- [`sm2asreml()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/sm2asreml.md)
  : Converts sparseMatrix to asreml's giv format

- [`spl()`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/spl.md)
  : Orthogonal Spline Design Matrix

- [`summary(`*`<MCMCglmm>`*`)`](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/reference/summary.MCMCglmm.md)
  : Summarising GLMM Fits from MCMCglmm

### Vignettes

- [MCMCglmm Course
  Notes](https://jarrodhadfield.github.io/MCMCglmm/articles/CourseNotes.md):
